name: Laser Spike
description:
Become a Space Pirate taking advantage of a Galaxy-wide war!

Available on Mac and Windows!

To everyone who has been wondering why the game is marked as On Hold even though the game has received frequent updates over the course of the last 3 months, this is due to my partner on this project who shall go un-named for privacy reasons, has decided to leave the project. He wanted to focus on his own RTS game. Until I am able to find a new partner to help with the heavy project this is, the game will stop getting updates. However, I will continue development on my other projects such as Project Ice and Maze Kid.
